content.detailedDescription: I was working at sunoco..Weather was nice it was a perfect day no clouds at all not any clouds ...I was standing out side watching passenger planes flying west in sky out of bwi airport..There were 7 or 8 in the air..4 planes had contrails they were shaded orange from sun..When out of no where a dim white flying saucer turns left slowly get realy big..It was  at least 10 or 15 times larger than any planes in the sky and there were at least 4  or 5 the whole 23 minutes that this went on..You could see the planes all on   outsides of ufo.0..Whenit appears it is dim it get big turns left gets super bright white starts turning blue orange red green shrinking in size when it got to be a small orange ball it blinked 2 times and was gone every 90 seconds it came back and did evrything i described all over again...This went on for 23 minutes there were 3 customers whom also seen this one got out of his car tried to use his binoculars.. this started at 6..06pm and ended at6..29 pm....
content.summary: Was watching jet planes enjoying weather.White saucer appeared .Turned left got superwhite bright .Shrinks to orange ball 2blinks gone .It kept ciming back.23 min.Observed..

content.detailedDescription: A heavy feeling in my chest and my friend looked past me causing me to turn and look. appeared like a shooting star
content.summary: Ball flying through the sky changing colors rapidly between blue green and white with an orangish glow coming off it.

content.detailedDescription: Same event as described as the evening before. lasted about 3hours & took the same path. again extremely bright star-like object. took the same path as previous night .
content.summary: Same sighting of object as night before, bright star-like object

content.detailedDescription: We were heading west on the high way coming from salem, ma. when around 9:17pm near lowell, ma. we noticed 4 big bright lights flying above our vehicle.They were moving just as fast as the car was going on the highway. it was cloudy but their bright light were very visible becuase it was dark cloudy. the 4 spinning lights would all come to togther and then criss-cross each other breaking back into 4 separate lights and still countinously spinning. when they separted out it looked like they were making a square formation then 2 of them at opposite ends would split into 2 more lights then they would all come back toghther spinning as 1 large light. they seemed to follow us for a while then we began to get very nervous. we know the exact time we noticed them beacuse my mothers iphone froze with the time locked on it and then quickly we gave her a nother phone to try and record with. her cellphone stopped working from 9:17pm-9:38pm. will submit video when i get from friends phone.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 4-6 bright bluish/white glowing circle lights flying above our vehicle spining in formation

content.detailedDescription: Reportings sightings report typi reportings darkter you albam
content.summary: You alien ufo sightings reportings

content.detailedDescription:
It was roughly 4:30 am, mid september.  i was on my porch that faces the west, having a cigarette.  as i was standing there, a extremely bright beam of light appears on the one side of the peak of the neighbors roof.  it was so bright, it casted shadows from it.  the light then disappeared, and another beam of light comes down on the opposite side of the roof peak.  at first what came to my mind was, did my neighbor install security lights on his roof?  that made no sense, as he has had no reason or problems that would cause him to install this type of lights.  i then thought that maybe another neighbor had a flash light out and was shining it at his roof, but that made no sense either, because the neighbor would have  had to have been way up high with the light pointing down.  i looked up to see where this light was shining down from, and could only see up about as far as maybe 300 feet, but there was nothing up above from where the light could have came from.  there was no sound coming from above, like maybe a helicopter or airplane it could have come from.  and what else was so unusual about this, there were no sounds going on at all, it was dead quiet.  no car sounds, no birds singing, no crickets, no cicada sounds, nothing.  this situation lasted no more than a minute.  i became really scared, seeing this light coming from out of nowhere.  if you were to go into my neighbors yard, there would have been no obstruction from trees or power lines in the path of this bright beam of light coming down on the roof.  it just stopped, all of a sudden.  i stood there, trying to justify what i just saw, and could not come up with any viable reason as to how this could have happened.  i saw the neighbor at about 5:30 am, leaving for work, and i just asked him if anything strange had happened at his house recently, and he said no.  i did not want to ask him directly about the light beam, i thought he would think i was crazy.  he just moved into this house about 6 weeks before this happened.  now each time i am out side, i am always looking over to his house to see if this happens again.  this has really bothered me since it happened.  if anyone has heard of something like this happening around here, please contact me and talk to me about it, please??

thank you,
[name removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: Extrelely bright  beam of light coming down  on the neighbor across the street from me's roof, 2 different beams, unknown source

content.detailedDescription:
It appeared differently on camera than it did using a mono-scope and field-glasses. by far the most interesting event was possibly a rather large emp discharge seen only on camera. this discharge followed a couple of smaller ones. as a former senior aerospace research engineer and private pilot this intrigued me the most and something that i had never witnessed visually. each discharge radiates out in two invisiable-to-the-eye waves from the center.  

it also appeared that the flight crew was having great difficulty attempting to regain control of the craft in light of a possible mechanical problem. the craft also appeared to lose altitude following each discharge but did appear to regain a little more control. after a period of time they soon dropped down behind a saddle in the mountain but it's glow was strong enough that it could still be seen for many miles.

note that this event took place near the area of bugarach mountain and rennes le chateau, both well known as possible energy centers.    

also note, that my son and i are still on vacation and staying with our friends chris and sue ingram in southern france and have not had a chance yet to down load the video from our camera to the computer, but will up load the video when we return in a couple of days. both chris and sue would be excellent to interview and are both english living in france. chris is a well know writer that can describe most everything to it's smallest detail.

one last observation is that one would think that the military, police and others would have taken action to investigate and/or recover this craft but none appears to have taken place. this craft appears to me to have made a possible hard, simi-controlled landing but did not explode and probably remained in tact.
content.summary: Pulsating disc, when viewed on camera gave off a rather large energy discharge, possibly emp.

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were out on our porch that faces west, just looking at the august night sky.  there were some low clouds, but for the most part it was clear.  as i looked towards the north sky, i yelled to my husband, "look!!, ufo's like i saw before!" what we saw were two orange yellow objects flying in tandem. they sort of look like a tulip flower on it's side.  they were heading north in a fast path.  one of the objects dropped down and behind the other, then flew back up and once again they were flying side by side.  they were very bright, but made no sound at all.  they proceeded north for approx. 10 seconds (?) then one disappeared, while the other continued on it's forward path.  approx. 2 seconds later, that too disappeared in the northern sky.  we were in shock, my husband more so than me, as i had seen this type of object in the past and had reported it.  i had told him of what i had seen in the past, but for him to see if for himself, he could not deny what he saw, especially him being a small airplane pilot.  he knew it was not an airplane, or any other craft he had seen in the past.

i wish i had made a report at the time of this sighting, as there have been two more since.  i am making reports on those occurrences.  it made me feel like i was going crazy, but i know now i should report what i see, to se if there is a pattern.

i hope someone will call me and talk to me about these things.  i'd really appreciate it.

thanks, lisa simon
content.summary: My husband and i witnessed 2 orange tulip shaped objects flying in tandem in the western night sky, then seperate and disappeared in the northen sky

content.detailedDescription:
I went out onto my front porch at approx. 8:30 pm. halfway above horizon, in the western night sky, i see a bright orange/yellow glowing object, shaped like a tulip flower on it's side.  i had made a previous report early this year, or late last year, about the same type of sighting. it had appeared out of nowhere, as i was looking at the stars at the time is when i first saw it. it startled me, but it just came out of nowhere.  it made no sound at all.  it gave off a steady bright appearance.  it hovered momentarily, maybe 3 seconds? dropped down a short ways, then ascended and proceeded in a northern direction.  what was s strange about this sighting was how fast it was going!  it was faster than any airplane, helicopter, jet, etc., that i had ever seen.  the entire event took no longer than 15 seconds.  as it proceeded quickly north, it then totally disappeared from sight.  there were no clouds for it to go behind.  i stood and watched for it to re-appear for a couple of minutes, but it was gone from sight and did not reappear.

this report will be number one of 3, starting with this latest occurrence.  in the last couple of months, from roughly august 2013 up until now, i and my husband have witnessed 3 ufo occurrences.  i will be making 2 more reports, but will be approximate dates.  i wish i had made a report after each sighting, i kind of felt i was going nuts here.  but it is clear to me now that something is going on in the area, and needs to be reported.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Orange yellow glowing object shaped like a tulip appeared in the west speeding fast dropped down proceeded north then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend and i were sitting on our back porch in fuquay varina nc when i spotted a glowing orb. the orb hovered in one place for about an hour while it changed many different colors and appeared to change shape. after hovering for an hour the ufo took off behind a tree line a lot faster than a plane could go. we took 3 pretty cool videos and i have almost twenty pictures. all of my pictures and videos are time stamped because they were taken with my cell phone
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: With boyfriend on back porch and spotyed a glowing ord it changed color and hovered for about an hour before taking off

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend and i were sitting on our back porch in fuquay varina nc when i spotted a glowing orb. the orb hovered in one place for about an hour while it changed many different colors and appeared to change shape. after hovering for an hour the ufo took off behind a tree line a lot faster than a plane could go. we took 3 pretty cool videos and i have almost twenty pictures. all of my pictures and videos are time stamped because they were taken with my cell phone

content.summary: With boyfriend on back porch and spotyed a glowing ord it changed color and hovered for about an hour before taking off

content.detailedDescription: Went out to smoke about an hour ago and noticed star like object in sky slightly above eastern horizon and noticed it was brighter than other stars. went back out an hour later and it has dramatically moved much high than before. looked at object through binoculars and it is a very bright star looking type object that is much closer than a star but hard to make out with binoculars. it is still in eastern sky as i am reporting this. would not be reporting if i didn't find it an interesting object that is not usually in the sky.
content.summary: Noticed star like object in eastern sky around 11pm and it's moving slowly north faster than other stars

content.detailedDescription: On my way to work spotted in the sky pulled over took picture have picture on my phone of ufo
content.summary: Glowing spirit movie fast

content.detailedDescription: N.A.
content.summary: N.A.

content.detailedDescription: Me, my son and his friend were driving east on lee road at about 8:10 pm, october 25, 2013.  i noticed a large bright light that was redish orange and was either shimering or rotating.  it was larger than a star or planet you might see in the night sky.  i kept watching while i was driving because it hadn't moved for at least five minutes.  i asked my son what he thought it may be to just joke about it being a ufo and he said i don't know probably a plane.  at that time i told him i don't know because it hasn't moved.  then it got brighter and started to fade to a small pin point and got bright again then to a small pin point then disappeared completely.  it was gone roughly 10 seconds and came back in the same spot and got bright then faded to a pin point then did that one more time and disappeared completely.  about 5 seconds later it reappeared quite a disance north of the spot it was previously in and got bright and was shining for a few seconds then it faded to a pin point and got bright again thn faded to a pin point and completely disappeared and i didn't see it come back at all.  i would say from my position to where was first hovering to where it ended up would be about thirty degrees north of the original position.
content.summary: Bright chevron hovering in eastern sky disappered then reappeared

content.detailedDescription:
while looking out the window of our flight from sf to den, i saw what appeared to be 2 black contrails coming up about 8 oclock and 10 to 20 degrees off to nw of a straight, vertical path.  within a minute or two it appeared to be a black, v shaped object (my wife saw it as u shaped).  
  at this point, it appeared to turn into a small, straight black line.  it appeared to have rotated and looped around to parallel the flight path of our airplane, horizontal to us and slightly behind.  this all took about 3 to 4 minutes.  for the remaining 4 to 6 minutes it seem to track with our straight east flight path (we had just reached cruising altitude, 30,000 ft.).
  after about 2-3 minutes it continued dropping behind us and then began slowly gaining altitude, till it became too far away to see.  i'm just guessing it was 10 to 15 miles away the whole time. it had maintained path as a small straight, black line.  
  i had hoped to share this with the pilots, but the flight was continuing to oklahoma and a crew change was being made too, so they hurried us off the plane as to count the number of continuing passengers.  my wife had basically the same observations as i did.  mike mccarthy
   this was southwest flight #355, san francisco to denver, lv 10:40am, arrive 2:00pm.
content.summary: Saw object out of n side airplane window

content.detailedDescription: I was working at a haunted house. it was just after 6pm when i first noticed the object. it was just becoming dark. i thought it was an airplane. but the color was wrong and the light wasn't blinking. i should also mention that it was also over a lake. i was partially in the woods so i lost it a few times through the branches. it seemed to be coming towards me when it stopped. it hovered in the air for about a minute and then headed off to my left. i then lost it through the trees. i felt no ill effects before, during, or after the encounter. nor did i experience any time distortions.  only i, that i know of, saw the object.
content.summary: Single slow moving orange sphere that stopped, hovered, then moved again

content.detailedDescription: i was out in the backyard playing with my 1 watt blue laser pointing it at a satellite when i saw a glowing light to the left of me becayse i was facing north west. i thought it might be a helicopter or plane as they do fly in the area but they have blinking lights that turn on over my town and you can hear the jet or heli engines. this was like a glowing ball or something so i turned off the laser to be saft and wait. no marker lights ever came on and it looked like a star but low and moving from my left to right so not at me. no way it could be a plane as they do not have bright side lights like a star..The color was more yellow gold with some white at the center. just looked like a glowing ball with no real solid surface. not 100% but would say about 80% is was not a plane or traditional aircraft. i know you must put on marker lights and have a blue and red so other planes can tell your direction of which this object had none of. could be government top secrete or something..Just hope it wasn't russian...I said hello to them in my mind just to be safe. swore they said hello back but who knows.. hope this is helpful.
content.summary: Golden white yellowish ball light. no markers or anyother lights. starlike.

content.detailedDescription:
I submitted a report on friday of what i thought was a planet and because of a error in seeing a plane go around and come back again i mistakenly believed i had saw a ufo for over one hour time, i would not have made the report before first finding out if there were any planets visible at that time and following up the next night to make sure it was not a planet or just a bright star, i saw the exqct same thing tonight saturday and it followed almost the exact same path as noted the night before. the plane threw me off and it only shows to make sure before submitting a report.

99 out of 100 times there is always a logical answer to what i am seeing, i was seeing venus which in itself pretty cool but i should not have submitted a sighting until i checked out other answers first, which i always do.

i apologize for mistakenly submitting my report, the plane really through me off, and was just a coincidence. 

as a side note saturday night i also saw an orange light that disappeared, this was only a chinese lantern, saw for app.30 - 45 seconds viewed through binoculars, you can normally see that the light will look like yellow and orange and you can see the candle flickering on top and the bottom look orange and when it burns out you can see the black structure of the lantern falling, its easy to think its a ufo,however i have also seen objects much larger that are similar in color but looking through binoculars looks like a ball of fire almost molten the only thing that to me looks like the lit end of a cigar if you blow on it, and it is flying. make sure to note if its windy or calm. 

its easy to mis identify objects, give your sighting time and most of the time you will be able to come up with a logical answer as to what you are seeing, but keep looking up and you may be able to see something incredible.
content.summary: Followup on report from day before

content.detailedDescription: Four lights pulsating. two quite close to each other. two others spread spread apart in an irregular spacing.There were about fifteen cars parked watching with people out of thier cars watching.The lights appeared to be moving away slowly with no noise ,heading south away from us.It was absolutly quiet outside and no airplane noise.It was cloudy  so they had to be below the clouds , with no stars to be seen.They gradually faded away .
content.summary: Four hovering lights  moving away

content.detailedDescription: 4 spot lights circling above the verrazano bridge then they moved north of the bridge and continued to hover/circle and then after 25 mins they disappeared.
content.summary: 4 circling spotlight hovering after one another north of the verazzano bridge.

content.detailedDescription: Went into a store, noticed the lights in the sky above the parking lot. i assumed that it was a halloween thing, went inside, shopped for 1/2 hour, came back outside and saw it again. it have me chills. drive a mile and a half home and the lights are above my parking lot now. really creeped me out so i took video of it with my iphone. sent it to my girlfriend, she says it's the northern lights but that doesn't look like any tnl's that i've found online. i sent it to my dad and he said send it to you guys asap. when i came in the house it was still in the sky. my phone has been acting up since i took the video too. dads voice got really distorted a few times, was hearing weird beeps and boils on the line and my key board is having very bad lag time, that never happens with this phone.
content.summary: 4 lights spinning in circle then converge then split and spin again

content.detailedDescription:
Several white orbs about 500 ft above ground traveling from east to west.

orbs at ends of line moved up and down and entire mass appeared, as if, to be riding a wave.

when it was far away, both inbound and outbound, it appeared a one unit.
only when directly overhead could you tell it was several separate orbs.
content.summary: White orbs traveling east to west just above tree's

content.detailedDescription: Traveling from new jersey on the new york state thruway, spotted 3 lights hovering changing patterns in the north sky while in a moving car. lights shifted to the eastern sky. my dad woke me up as he spotted 3 lights moving in the sky. lights went from 3 to 4 in minutes. we thought it was spotlights but it stayed with our car as we traveled 20 miles and rotated. lights were still observable outside of the backseat window after the time of 8:05 pm. started off as 3 lights, rotated and the lights would move close together then spread out about the wingspan of a large plane. lights rotated into a ball like form then stretched again, cycle repeated. during the sighting we were trying to figure out what it was, after the sighting we were shocked. we lost sight because as we traveled further north then a change of direction to east. in the video the lights appear as blue but as i watched with my eyes they were a white color.
content.summary: Rotating 3-4 lights observed for 20 miles while moving
content.locationName: New Jersey, New York, New York

content.detailedDescription:
Around 9ish pm was observing the stars on a cold and very clear night. saw many planes in different flight paths across the sky. noticed a fairly bright orangish, yellowish light moving slowly from the nw to the n. no blinking lights. it was fairly slow and after crossing about half of the sky that i was looking at it started to fade then quickly thereafter completely disappeared. 

i was facing the direction of the park (great smoky mountain national park) from hwy 74/23/19 in southwestern nc. it seemed that the light was in the upper? atmosphere where a high flying plane might be? it was hard to tell.
content.summary: Orb over great smoky mountains national park?

content.detailedDescription:
my mother witnessed it, i am here typing this in for her and now im gonna let her type what she saw.:

  i saw what i thought was a jet in the sky. it had 2 contrails. it was moving very fast. the sky was very clear with no clouds. 

what really caught my attention was the color of this jet.
i looked at the jet to get a better view. it was cross shaped . this jet was extremely bright, very shiny ,and pale gold  in color.

i ran to the door and told  my son to come look at it , but just that soon it  was already gone and the contrails also had disappeared .

the jet was going east. no trace of it at all was left in the sky.
content.summary: Very bright shiney polished gold cross heading east at high speed vanishes

content.detailedDescription: I was dropping my son off at his mothers house in ashford, ct. his mother met me in the driveway and we were chatting, standing outside of my vehicle. i noticed an orange glowing orb flying past, going from east to west. i mentioned to my son's mother that it was a ufo. she then noticed a second orb of the same color and size about 30 secs later flying in the same direction at the same altitude. six more orange orbs flew in the same direction consecutively. about 3 mins later, 2 more orange orbs appeared and were flying in the same direction. these ones were closer together. orb number 9 seemed to float to the ground slowly while the tenth orb continued the same path as the previous ones.
content.summary: 10 orange glowing orbs flying in a straight line. the ninth one in the line floated down out of sight..

content.detailedDescription:
My cousin and i were traveling to west virginia from virginia talking and going pretty fast. all at once i hit a whitish grey looking object with my windshield where the rear view mirror is.  the thing disentigrated leaving white dusty trail on my roof of my truck that is still there.  after i finish this i am going outside to take a sample of this. i hit this thing going about 60 mph and have no idea what this was but it looked to me at a quick glance, like a dirty snow ball but the weather this evening is in the 60's with no precipitation.

we walked the whole erea to see if this could have been some kind of bird but found nothing.  the trail of dust looks like the object would have landed in the back of the truck but nothing there either.  if you have any idea what this was or would like to check the sample, please contact me.  i will try to take a picture but i do not have a good digital camera and it is now dark outside but i will try anyway     thanks josh
content.summary: Like a dirty snowball or something in apearence but i hit it with my truck and it disentigrated into white powder and left residue.  exploded like if you was to hit a poolball.  this thing was like floating in the road and i hit it going about 45-60 mph

content.detailedDescription: Driving in my car saw two orange orbs. thought it was part of the meteor shower. stopped car and put down window. heard no sound. then watched as two others came from behind trees and followed the two orbs. slowly rising then picking up speed until out of sight.Location longstown.
content.summary: Orange glowing orbs.Very low. gained altitude in a straight line. one behind the other.

content.detailedDescription: My wife was going to get some coffee when she stopped at the intersection of thorton and llano in clovis, new mexico. when she stopped at the stop sign, she noticed the saucer to the east heading west, then it just disappeared. she told me about it and i felt that it needed to be reported to someone. my wife said she was amazed that she finally saw one, she seems pretty excited now that she can be counted among those that have seen one. she told me that it was right there in plain sight then it simply flashed out, gone.
content.summary: Size of a pick up, steady lights around the perimeter
